COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

PARAM.name: area_id
PARAM.help: OSPF area id as ip address or number

COMMAND.name: auto-cost
COMMAND.help: Calculate OSPF interface cost according to bandwidth

PARAM.name: reference-bandwidth
PARAM.help: Use reference bandwidth method to assign OSPF cost

COMMAND.name: fast-converge
COMMAND.help: Fine Tune ospf parameters for faster convergence

PARAM.name: router-lsa
PARAM.help: Set maximum metric for self-originated router-lsas

PARAM.name: bgp-interval
PARAM.help: wait timer for bgp to come up

COMMAND.name: redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.help: The minimum interval in milliseconds between accepting the same lsa (default = 1000)

PARAM.name: delay-val
PARAM.help: Delay between receiving a change to SPF calculation in milliseconds

PARAM.name: all
PARAM.help: For all type of OSPF LSAs

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.help: Delay to generate first ocuurance of LSA in millisecondsi (default = 0)

PARAM.name: min-delay
PARAM.help: Minimum delay between originating the same LSA in milliseconds (default = 5000)

PARAM.name: max-delay
PARAM.help: Maximum delay between originating the same LSA in milliseconds (default = 5000)

PARAM.name: area_id
PARAM.help: OSPF area id as a decimal value

COMMAND.name: no auto-cost
COMMAND.help: Calculate OSPF interface cost according to bandwidth

PARAM.name: reference-bandwidth
PARAM.help: Use reference bandwidth method to assign OSPF cost

COMMAND.name: no fast-converge
COMMAND.help: Fine Tune ospf parameters for faster convergence

PARAM.name: router-lsa
PARAM.help: Set maximum metric for self-originated router-lsas

COMMAND.name: no redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.help: The minimum interval in milliseconds between accepting the same lsa (default = 1000)

PARAM.name: delay-val
PARAM.help: Delay between receiving a change to SPF calculation in milliseconds

PARAM.name: all
PARAM.help: For all type of OSPF LSAs
